Text:
Audio Tracks are all demuxed, so download the ones you want.
Use MPC ( http://cccp-project.net/ ) to automatically recognize & play the external Audio tracks
or mux the Audio in MKV with mkvmerge
( http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix ) if you wish to use other player.
THX this was a really good movie!! like it
